name: Snack Shack
description:
A game where you work at a snack shack at a pool. Server to customers. 

This game was made in 12 hours as a random project I thought of.

I'm pretty bad at coding, but I would say this is pretty good for 12 hours.

Not AAA quality. Just a little project I will never come back to.

Made in Unity.

CONTROLS:

Left click: Pickup/Drop items

Right click: Interact

Right click the knob on the microwave to start cooking popcooch

P: Turn on cheats (Can not be turned off without restart)
